00012 public class Column implements DatabaseObject, Comparable<Column> {
00013     private Table table;
00014     private View view;
00015     private String name;
00016     private int dataType;
00017     private int columnSize;
00018     private int decimalDigits;
00019     private Boolean nullable;
00020     private String typeName;
00021     private Object defaultValue;
00022     private boolean autoIncrement = false;
00023     private boolean primaryKey = false;
00024     private boolean unique = false;

00103     public String toString() {
00104         String tableOrViewName;
00105         if (table == null) {
00106             tableOrViewName = view.getName();
00107         } else {
00108             tableOrViewName = table.getName();
00109         }
00110         return tableOrViewName +"."+getName();
00111     }
00112 
00113 
00114     public int compareTo(Column o) {
00115         try {
00116             //noinspection UnusedAssignment
00117             int returnValue = 0;
00118             if (this.getTable() != null && o.getTable() == null) {
00119                 return 1;
00120             } else if (this.getTable() == null && o.getTable() != null) {
00121                 return -1;
00122             } else if (this.getTable() == null && o.getTable() == null) {
00123                 returnValue = this.getView().compareTo(o.getView());
00124             } else {
00125                 returnValue = this.getTable().compareTo(o.getTable());
00126             }
00127 
00128             if (returnValue == 0) {
00129                 returnValue = this.getName().compareTo(o.getName());
00130             }
00131 
00132             return returnValue;
00133         } catch (Exception e) {
00134             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00135         }
00136     }
00137 
00138 
00139     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00140         try {
00141             if (this == o) return true;
00142             if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00143 
00144             Column column = (Column) o;
00145 
00146             return name.equalsIgnoreCase(column.name) && !(table != null ? !table.equals(column.table) : column.table != null) && !(view != null ? !view.equals(column.view) : column.view != null);
00147         } catch (Exception e) {
00148             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00149         }
00150 
00151     }
00152 
00153     public int hashCode() {
00154         try {
00155             int result;
00156             result = (table != null ? table.hashCode() : 0);
00157             result = 31 * result + (view != null ? view.hashCode() : 0);
00158             result = 31 * result + name.toUpperCase().hashCode();
00159             return result;
00160         } catch (Exception e) {
00161             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00168     public String getDataTypeString(Database database) {
00169         List<Integer> noParens = Arrays.asList(
00170                 Types.ARRAY,
00171                 Types.BIGINT,
00172                 Types.BINARY,
00173                 Types.BIT,
00174                 Types.BLOB,
00175                 Types.BOOLEAN,
00176                 Types.CLOB,
00177                 Types.DATALINK,
00178                 Types.DATE,
00179                 Types.DISTINCT,
00180                 Types.INTEGER,
00181                 Types.JAVA_OBJECT,
00182                 Types.LONGVARBINARY,
00183                 Types.NULL,
00184                 Types.OTHER,
00185                 Types.REF,
00186                 Types.SMALLINT,
00187                 Types.STRUCT,
00188                 Types.TIME,
00189                 Types.TIMESTAMP,
00190                 Types.TINYINT,
00191                 Types.LONGVARCHAR);
00192 
00193         List<Integer> oneParam = Arrays.asList(
00194                 Types.CHAR,
00195                 Types.VARCHAR,
00196                 Types.VARBINARY
00197         );
00198 
00199         List<Integer> twoParams = Arrays.asList(
00200                 Types.DECIMAL,
00201                 Types.DOUBLE,
00202                 Types.FLOAT,
00203                 Types.NUMERIC,
00204                 Types.REAL
00205         );
00206 
00207         String translatedTypeName = this.getTypeName();
00208         if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase) {
00209             if ("bpchar".equals(translatedTypeName)) {
00210                 translatedTypeName = "char";
00211             }
00212         }
00213 
00214         String dataType;
00215         if (noParens.contains(this.getDataType())) {
00216             dataType = translatedTypeName;
00217         } else if (oneParam.contains(this.getDataType())) {
00218             if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase && translatedTypeName.equals("text")) {
00219                 return translatedTypeName;
00220             } else if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase && translatedTypeName.equals("uniqueidentifier")) {
00221                 return translatedTypeName;
00222             }
00223             dataType = translatedTypeName+"("+this.getColumnSize()+")";
00224         } else if (twoParams.contains(this.getDataType())) {
00225             if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase && this.getColumnSize() == 131089 ) {
00226                 dataType = "DECIMAL";
00227             } else if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase && translatedTypeName.equalsIgnoreCase("money")) {
00228                 dataType = translatedTypeName.toUpperCase();
00229             } else {
00230                 dataType = translatedTypeName+"("+this.getColumnSize()+","+this.getDecimalDigits()+")";
00231             }
00232         } else {
00233             throw new RuntimeException("Unknown Data Type: "+this.getDataType()+" ("+this.getTypeName()+")");
00234         }
00235         return dataType;
00236     }

00258     public boolean isDataTypeDifferent(Column otherColumn) {
00259         return this.getDataType() != otherColumn.getDataType()
00260                 || this.getColumnSize() != otherColumn.getColumnSize()
00261                 || this.getDecimalDigits() != otherColumn.getDecimalDigits();
00262     }
00263 
00264     @SuppressWarnings({"SimplifiableIfStatement"})
00265     public boolean isNullabilityDifferent(Column otherColumn) {
00266         if (this.isNullable() == null && otherColumn.isNullable() == null) {
00267             return false;
00268         }
00269         if (this.isNullable() == null && otherColumn.isNullable() != null) {
00270             return true;
00271         }
00272         if (this.isNullable() != null && otherColumn.isNullable() == null) {
00273             return true;
00274         }
00275         return !this.isNullable().equals(otherColumn.isNullable());
00276     }
00277 
00278     public boolean isDifferent(Column otherColumn) {
00279         return isDataTypeDifferent(otherColumn) || isNullabilityDifferent(otherColumn);
00280     }
